# Bet, Queen of Jordan

| runtime        = 75 minutes
| country        = Netherlands
| language       = Silent
| budget         =
}}
Bet, Queen of Jordan () is a 1924 Dutch silent film directed by Adriënne Solser and Pierre Hulsman. It was the first of four films featuring Solser as Bet.
Cast
* Adriënne Solser - Bet Strik
* Jan Nooy - Hein Strik
* Beppie Nooy Sr. - Trui Bles / De Weduwe
